thama siragathawa sitiya di dina gananak yanathuru siya biriyata thorathurak laba di nothibunu athara eda aya windi wedanawa ada anoma fonseka mahathmiyata windinnata siduwima danduwamak bawa da hitapu sarayan mejar es. ee. es. wijethunga pawasiya.eheth fonseka mahathmiya eda thama biriya asarana wu lesa asarana thaththwayata pathwa nomathi bawath ayata pihitawimata aya menma jenaralwaraya daka ganimata oonama awasthawaka ida labi athi bawa da hethema pawasiya.sebaliyakata awawada kirima hethuwen winaya chodana yatathe eda hamudapathiwa siti jenaral sarath fonseka mahathage niyogayen hamuda polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena siragatha kala thama pilibanda nadu noasa hamudawen askara damu bawa wijethunga mahatha sandahan keleya.

janatha aragalayedi dakwana dakshathawa podujana mehewaredi ee aakarayenma pennum karana janatha nayakayin itha athalossakage namawaliya atharata richard pathirana namayada athulath wanne nithathini.warsha 1977 balawath pasubamakata muhuna dun shrilanipa pragathishili balawegaya jayagrahi mawatha wetha nawatha kandawa ganimin rajya palana wagakima yalith bhara ganima dakwa wu gamana yali sihipath karana kisiwakuta ee sandaha richard pathirana mahatha athin ituwu sewawa amathaka kara kisiseth katha kala nohakiya.uthureth, dakuneth le ganga gala giya mini kandu goda gasunu bhishanaya samajaya welagath palanayata wiruddhawa prajathanthrawadi janatha balaya ekras kirimata nayakathwaya labadun richard pathirana mahatha ha apa athara ee yugaye di athi wu sabandathawa ethuma miyayana thekma thawa thawath thahawuru wu itha samipa sabandathawak wiya.pasal awadiyedima shishya deshapalana katayuthuwalatath in anathuruwa shrilanipa tharuna sangamaye deshapalanayatath awathirna wu mama regu departhamenthuwe rakiyawata theripath wi kolambaa randi siti awadiye ewakata wipakshaye manthriwarayaku lesa katayuthu kala richard mahatha samanga sabandatha thawath thahawuru kala yugayak thibini.
